Text:
hey penandpike, i like the info u provide. but when it comes to 1080p in 4.37Gb, its very hard to get a perfect quality. very few ppl like PS3-TEAM can do it. 
so how abt some screenshots or a small sample file till the time ppl start trusting u. that was just a suggestion, dont get offended.

I doubt anyone can make a perfect quality in 4.37g.
But for it's size I'll say it is.

hey, the quality is pretty good for a 1080p file in a small size but can you turn off the subtitles, i can't seem to figure it out, tried turning them off through windows media player didn't work, their kinda annoying, i speak english so i don't need english subtitles so their should've been an option to turn them off so people who speak english can turn them off
